attributes.action: Order Faye Turney and the rest of the 15 detainees recently released from Iran to do the honourable thing and hand over all monies earned from selling their stories to the Royal British Legion or the Solders Sailors Airmen and families association.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a serving member of the Royal Navy I am upset that the MOD have allowed Service personal to sell stories to the Media for personal gain. I and many of my fellow sailors are embarrassed and ashamed by such actions and believe that the only way to make these actions honourable is to donate ALL monies gained to the Royal British Legion or Solder Sailor Airmen and families association. May all our thoughts be with those families who have lost loved ones out in Iraq and Afghanistan.

rejection.details:
This petition overlaps with several in existence already - 
http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/NavyStories/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
